hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Run_RestAssured_Test_Cases
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Configure this parameter to Yes if you want to automatically run RestAssured pipeline once this build is successful.

definition.script:
pipeline { agent { node { label 'build_slave' } } environment { BUILD_NAME = "DMAP Binary Build" NOTIFYUSERS = 'dmap_dev@newtglobalcorp.com' //NOTIFYUSERS = 'kavyasrim@newtglobalcorp.com' BUILD_DETAILS = "
Job Name: ${env.JOB_NAME}
Build Number: ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}
Build URL: ${BUILD_URL}" } tools { nodejs "nodejs" } parameters { choice(name: 'Build_Type', choices: ['Dev', 'QA','Prod'], description: 'Select build type') choice(name: 'Run_RestAssured_Test_Cases', choices: ['Yes', 'No'], description: 'Configure this parameter to Yes if you want to automatically run RestAssured pipeline once this build is successful.') string(name: 'RestAssured_Docker_Image', defaultValue: 'ngdmapo/dmap_azure_blob_dev:v8.1.4.1', description: 'Enter the Docker_Image') } options { timestamps() timeout(time: 12, unit: 'HOURS') buildDiscarder(logRotator(numToKeepStr: '10')) } stages { stage ("Package Binary") { steps { echo "------------------Package Binary------------------" } } } post { success { script { if (params['Build_Type'] == 'Dev'){ echo "DEV" params['RestAssured_Docker_Image'] = 'Test' echo params['RestAssured_Docker_Image'] } if (params['Build_Type'] == 'QA'){ echo "DEV" } //echo params['RestAssured_Docker_Image'] } } }}
